GLM_GTX_color_space_YCoCg
[GTX Extensions (Experimental)]

Detailed Description

RGB to YCoCg conversions and operations.

<glm/gtx/color_space_YCoCg.hpp> need to be included to use these functionalities.

Function Documentation

GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3< T, P > glm::rgb2YCoCg ( detail::tvec3< T, P > const &  rgbColor  )  [inline]

Convert a color from RGB color space to YCoCg color space.

Definition at line 14 of file color_space_YCoCg.inl.

00017         {
00018                 detail::tvec3<T, P> result;
00019                 result.x/*Y */ =   rgbColor.r / T(4) + rgbColor.g / T(2) + rgbColor.b / T(4);
00020                 result.y/*Co*/ =   rgbColor.r / T(2) + rgbColor.g * T(0) - rgbColor.b / T(2);
00021                 result.z/*Cg*/ = - rgbColor.r / T(4) + rgbColor.g / T(2) - rgbColor.b / T(4);
00022                 return result;
00023         }

Definition at line 27 of file color_space_YCoCg.inl.

00030         {
00031                 detail::tvec3<T, P> result;
00032                 result.x/*Y */ = rgbColor.g / T(2) + (rgbColor.r + rgbColor.b) / T(4);
00033                 result.y/*Co*/ = rgbColor.r - rgbColor.b;
00034                 result.z/*Cg*/ = rgbColor.g - (rgbColor.r + rgbColor.b) / T(2);
00035                 return result;
00036         }
